channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Waymo probed by National Transportation Safety Board over illegal school bus behavior
item.description: The NTSB joins the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration in investigating Waymo vehicles illegally passing stopped school buses.

item.title: What to know about Netflix’s landmark acquisition of Warner Bros.
item.description: Learn more about Netflix's acquisition of Warner Bros., considered the most historic megadeal in Hollywood, as it continues to develop.

item.title: CBP Wants AI-Powered ‘Quantum Sensors’ for Finding Fentanyl in Cars
item.description: US Customs and Border Protection is paying General Dynamics to create prototype “quantum sensors,” to be used with an AI database to detect fentanyl a...

item.title: Our Favorite Earbuds for Most People Are Over 25 Percent Off
item.description: These excellent earbuds were already a good deal before the discount.

item.title: Age Verification Is Reaching a Global Tipping Point. Is TikTok’s Strategy a Good Compromise?
item.description: TikTok’s new age-detection tech seems like a better solution than automatically banning youth accounts. But experts say it still requires social platf...

item.title: The Rippling/Deel corporate spying scandal may have taken another wild turn
item.description: The Department of Justice may be conducting a criminal investigation. This is arguably the biggest drama between two HR startups ever.

item.title: Researchers say Russian government hackers were behind attempted Poland power outage
item.description: Security researchers have attributed the attempted use of destructive "wiper" malware across Poland's energy infrastructure in late December to a Russ...

item.title: TikTok Is Now Collecting Even More Data About Its Users. Here Are the 3 Biggest Changes
item.description: According to its new privacy policy, TikTok now collects more data on its users, including their precise location, after majority ownership officially...

item.title: How did Davos turn into a tech conference?
item.description: The World Economic Forum’s annual meeting in Davos felt different this year, and not just because Meta and Salesforce took over storefronts on the mai...

item.title: How to Prep for This Weekend’s Big Winter Storm: Power, Heat, and Underwear
item.description: Bitter cold, power outages, and impassible roads are a terrible cocktail. Here’s how to prep and bunker in for an extreme winter storm.
